name: OrganizationAffiliation.period
title: OrganizationAffiliation.period
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The period during which the participatingOrganization is affiliated with the primary organization
element.definition: The period during which the participatingOrganization is affiliated with the primary organization.
element.requirements: An affiliation may be created ahead of time and only be active for a defined period of time. Once the affiliation is complete, the fact that it existed may still be required.
